data.eml:eml: Taxonomy of inquilines of oak gall wasps of Panama, with description of eight new species of Synergus Hartig (Hymenoptera, Cynipidae, Synergini)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Nieves-Aldrey, Jose Luis, Medianero, Enrique (2011): Taxonomy of inquilines of oak gall wasps of Panama, with description of eight new species of Synergus Hartig (Hymenoptera, Cynipidae, Synergini). Zootaxa 2774: 1-47, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.276876
